cause.description:
This country needs a revolution or else...(you know what's going to happen?)
1. Corruption in the country
2. Unstable Economic Policy
3. Unstable Foreign Policy
4. Judiciary
5. Police; the real criminals
6. Inflation
7. Poverty
8. Low and never climbing literacy rate
9. Women's and childern's rights
10. Political instability
11. Situation at the Tribal areas
12. Partial freedom of press
13. Increasing influence of political maulvis
14. and so many other problems...
cause.name: Inqilab-e-Pakistan
